verbs.description: On Sunday ’s installment of Showtime ’s The Circus , CNN Tonight host Don Lemon [V: was] profiled and he lashed out at President Trump as a “ racist ” and insinuated that Trump ’s criticism of him was racially - based . Thankfully , the show also profiled our friends at the Daily Caller and , to the show ’s credit , the interviews allowed for Daily Caller personality to offer some excellent
